summary: An email from an FBI agent in the New York office (Squad C-20, Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) to another FBI recipient, forwarding an attachment titled 'Epstein_Island_Operational_Travel_Plan.docx' and requesting verification of its accuracy. The email is dated August 7, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: R (NY) (FBI)
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email from the FBI New York office, specifically from Squad C-20 which handles Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking.

events.title: FBI email regarding Epstein Island travel plan
events.description: An FBI agent sends an email with an attachment titled 'Epstein_Island_Operational_Travel_Plan.docx' and requests verification of its accuracy.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York office, specifically Squad C-20 (Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking), was actively investigating Epstein-related matters as of August 2019.
An operational travel plan document for Epstein Island existed and was being circulated among FBI personnel for verification.
The email is dated August 7, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
